biotools.summary: Implementation of  four major subtype classifiers for high-grade serous (HGS) ovarian cancer. In addition, it implements a consensus classifier, which consolidates and improves on the robustness of the proposed subtype classifiers, thereby providing reliable stratification of patients with HGS ovarian tumors of clearly defined subtype.

bioschemas.name: consensusOV
